item.title: Hate for Hate
item.description: Hate for Hate is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: Il segno del Coyote
item.description: 1963 Italian-Spanish adventure Western movie directed by Mario Caiano

item.title: Doc, Hands of Steel
item.description: Doc, Hands of Steel is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.

item.title: A Pistol for Ringo
item.description: A Pistol for Ringo is a 1965 Spaghetti Western, a joint Italian and Spanish production. Originally written and directed by Duccio Tessari, the film's success led to a sequel, The Return of Ringo, later that year.

item.title: If You Meet Sartana Pray for Your Death
item.description: If You Meet Sartana Pray for Your Death is a 1968 spaghetti western film directed by Gianfranco Parolini. The film stars Gianni Garko, William Berger, Fernando Sancho and Klaus Kinski, and features a musical score by Piero Piccioni.

item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt, also known as The Man from Nowhere, is a Spaghetti Western directed by Michele Lupo and starring Giuliano Gemma, Fernando Sancho and Corinne Marchand.

item.title: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven
item.description: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone and starring Brett Halsey.

item.title: Clint the Stranger
item.description: Clint the Stranger, also known as Clint the Nevada's Loner, Nevada Clint and Clint, the Lonely Nevadan, is a 1967 Italian spaghetti western starring George Martin. A sequel entitled The Return of Clint the Stranger would follow in 1972.

item.title: Minnesota Clay
item.description: Minnesota Clay is a 1964 Italian/French/Spanish international co-production spaghetti western directed by Sergio Corbucci.

item.title: Ciccio Forgives
item.description: Ciccio perdona... Io no!, internationally known as Ciccio Forgives, I Don't, is a 1968 Italian comedy film directed by Marcello Ciorciolini. It is a spaghetti western parody of God Forgives... I Don't!.
